# File lib/bit-struct/bit-struct.rb, line 87
    def inspect_in_object(obj, opts)
      val = obj.send(name)
      str =
        begin
          val.inspect(opts)
        rescue ArgumentError # assume: "wrong number of arguments (1 for 0)"
          val.inspect
        end
      (f=@format) ? (f % str) : str
    end
